title: Codelist schema
description: Schema for OCDS codelist CSV files.

Code.title: Code
Code.description: The value to use in OCDS data. Codes should match the letter case of external codes (e.g. ISO 4217, JSON Schema, GeoJSON, IANA Media Types) and should be camel case, otherwise.

Title.title: Title
Title.description: A short title for the code.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A longer-form description of the code.

Business Logic.title: Business Logic
Business Logic.description: A description of how this field's value relates to the values of other fields.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: A single category by which to filter codes. The extension's documentation should explain the categorization system.

Deprecated.title: Deprecated
Deprecated.description: The minor version of OCDS in which the code was deprecated.

Deprecation note.title: Deprecation note
Deprecation note.description: The reason for the deprecation, and any guidance.

Extension.title: Extension
Extension.description: The title of the OCDS extension from which the code is sourced, or 'OCDS Core'.

Framework.title: Framework
Framework.description: A reference to The World Bank Framework for Disclosure in Public Private Partnership Projects.

Notes.title: Notes
Notes.description: Notes on the application of the code

Section.title: Section
Section.description: The only OCDS objects in which this documentType code should be used. (This field is a ', '-delimited value in the CSV file.)

Source.title: Source
Source.description: The third-party source for the code.

URI Pattern.title: URI Pattern
URI Pattern.description: The pattern to which URLs following this scheme should adhere.

Valid Until.title: Valid Until
Valid Until.description: The date past which the code is no longer valid for use.
